snippet.title: Fight Life: Vanguard - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2927700/Fight_Life_Vanguard/
Wishlist on Steam and Follow us on X/Twitter!⬆️
This is the best way to support our game.

Engage in strategic turn-based combat, manage and upgrade each character, and strive to reclaim harmony in a world on the brink of oblivion. Take on the mantle of leadership as you guide a mercenary squad through perilous landscapes, selecting your comrades from a diverse pool of skilled recruits.

Follow Fight Life: Vanguard for the latest news and development updates. ▼
Twitter: https://x.com/FightLifeGame
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/publisher/twocakesstudio
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/user/twocakesstudio/
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@twocakesstudio 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/twocakesstudio/

#gaming #games #gamedev #indiegame #rpg #turnbased #steam
